mapper.insert: insert into memo(memo_idx, title, memo, member_idx) values (memo_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{memo}, #{member_idx})
mapper.update: update memo set title = #{title}, memo = #{memo} where memo_idx = #{memo_idx}
